name: Hero 3
description: Hero sections are used to introduce the product or service. They are the first and primary section of the website. This is a centered hero section with a large title, a subtitle and three features.

strings.description: Main title of the hero section
First feature listed in the hero section
Second feature listed in the hero section
Third feature listed in the hero section
Descriptive paragraph of the hero section

images.description: Image displayed in the hero section

name: Content with image
description: Content columns are used to provide more detailed information about the product or service. This is a rtwo column content section with image on the left.

strings.description: The title for the content section
The main content text of the section
Button text in the content section

images.description: The featured image of the content section

name: Features Row
description: Feature columns are used to highlight the main features of the product or service. This section is a three column grid.

name: Content 4
description: Content columns are used to provide more detailed information about the product or service. This is a two row content section with first paragraph on top, and two in bottom side-by-side.

strings.description: The first paragraph text of the content block.
The second paragraph text of the content block.
The third paragraph text of the content block.

name: Features grid
description: Feature columns are used to highlight the main features of the product or service. This section is a three column grid with two rows.

strings.description: The title for the features grid section
Description for the features grid section

name: Testimonial on Background
description: Testimonial sections are used to show what customers think about the product or service. This section is a centered testimonial.

strings.description: Name of an author, preferably a dummy name
